additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Soft Drink Contains: Purified Water, Natural Flavour, Food Acid (330), Natural Colours (161B, 120) Sweeteners (950, 952, 955), Preservative (211).

description: This ain't just any Passionfruit flavoured drink, this is Kirks 'Pasito'. It's as classic as Aunty Dawn's Pavlova, served with passionfruit of course. So we hope you enjoy the 'Passionfruiti-ness'.
name: Sugar Free Pasito Soft Drink Bottle
